mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shoot.shoot_info (content, price, takeTime, takeLocation, takeResult, creationDate, typeId, costId, requireRoles,requireSecurityAccount,shootAddressId,stateId,userId )VALUES (#{content},#{price},#{takeTime},#{takeLocation},#{takeResult},#{creationDate}, #{typeId},#{costId},#{requireRoles},#{requireSecurityAccount},#{shootAddressId},1,#{userId})
mapper.select:
SELECT i.*,u.id u_id,u.member,u.portyaitl,u.securityMoney,u.userName, t.id t_id,t.typeName,st.id st_id,st.costName,r.id r_id,r.roleName, a.id a_id,p.id p_id,p.prow,c.id c_id,c.city,co.id co_id,co.country, sty.id sty_id,yl.id yl_id,yl.styleName FROM shoot_info i INNER JOIN shoot_user u ON i.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_type t ON i.typeId=t.id INNER JOIN shoot_cost st ON i.costId=st.id INNER JOIN shoot_user_role ur ON ur.userId=u.id INNER JOIN shoot_role r ON r.id=ur.roleId INNER JOIN shoot_address a ON a.id=i.shootAddressId INNER JOIN shoot_prow p ON a.prow_id=p.id INNER JOIN shoot_city c ON a.city_id=c.id INNER JOIN shoot_country co ON a.country_id=co.id LEFT JOIN shoot_info_style sty ON sty.infoId=i.id LEFT JOIN shoot_style yl ON sty.styleId=yl.id
i.id=#{id}
